parameters: Here, we stand. We are \N[1]. The split of
Darkness and Light -- "Draka neh Lothos". The
Heavens needed a shield and they sent you. Hell
needed a weapon, and they sent me.
With more dark energy, I would have manifested
as something greater than you... but your
allies are aware. They scatter my energy,
So... with the remainder of dark energy I have,
I could only manifest as something similar to
you... but better. This form... how sad.
Allow me to rid you of it.
Hm... you have forced my hand... if any of my
Archdemons are still alive out there, and still
dormant, I can re-absorb their power... As long
as they sleep, human energy will not draw them.
Aagh!!! No! My power! All of my Archdemons are
No... you defeated all of my Archdemons..? I...
I promise. Humanity will always have
darkness... so I shall always return...
(A booming voice echoes in the air...)
"From this gate, Darkness -- a child of Life -- came into
this world, for Life to gather as one hand, and strike down
Haha, all my archdemons we're still alive and
dormant. Now, my final form is manifested. It
Hm, 2 of my archdemons we're still alive and
dormant. Seems like their power was enough to
manifest my 3rd form. You don't stand a chance.
Hm, only 1 of my archdemons was still alive
and dormant. Seems like its power could only
manifest my 2nd form. No matter, let's see how
I promise. Humanity will always have
darkness... so I shall always return...
(A booming voice echoes in the air...)
"From this gate, Darkness -- a child of Life -- came into
this world, for Life to gather as one hand, and strike down
"From this gate, Darkness -- a child of Life -- comes into
the world, for Life to gather as one hand, and strike down

(Hm... there's a note beside the axe...)
"Long live, Yellow team. My team and I are descending into
the underworld at sunrise... I'm taking this note with me.
If someone finds this, then I'm dead... and there probably
won't be any remains left. I heard demons eat every bit..."
"...To whoever finds this, take my axe. It is the most
precious to me, and of the upmost rarity. It is entwined
with materials that allow it to absorb energy in its
vicinity... even dark energy if surrounded, but at a cost."
(Hm... the axe seems radiant with dark energy.
Makes sense... it's been in the underworld for
You did it! I didn't think you would find the
chasm first! I am relieved to see you made
it in one piece. I didn't see the demon you
just faced, but it must have been powerful.
I felt the immense dark energy in the air...
Unbelievable power... but once that energy died
down, I knew it was over. It was the same thing
I felt at the end of my last hunt.
So I made my way straight here! I ran into
Wilantos too, on the way. He is guarding the
chasm entrance to protect our flank. The last
thing we need is to get cornered down here...
Now, let's get out of here, \N[1].
